title: 026 - AJ Hawk Rejoins The Boys
description: On today's episode of The Pod, friend of the office, AJ Hawk joins the guys to cover everything from Pat and AJ's NFL Draft special LIVE in primetime next week, what they've been watching to deal with the quarantine, Pat reminisces about his weekend with John Daly when their friendship was forged, and the boys of The Pub moving into a new home. Stay safe this weekend, and enjoy.
